description:
To start with small steps, only one short novel (10 pages) for this first meeting - The Signal Man by Charles Dickens, available here for convenience:


http://www.nationalshortstoryweek.org.uk/documents/The%20Signal%20Man%20by%20Charles%20Dickens.pdf

Open discussion to see what the group like to takes away/look for in a book - literary style, meaning and implications, context, etc?

We'll start at 11:00, with 11:30 Cook & Book serves brunch for those that want to add something to the book and coffee.
how_to_find_us: Cook & Book, Woluve Saint Lambert, Rodebeek metro stop
name: Have coffee and discuss the Signal Man by Dickens
